title: Scream of the Crocodile
description: Visit the swamp where Banty, wise beyond her years, and her family struggle to survive. Their secrets are many and cut deep.A well-educated local man, Ade LaFitte, recognizes Banty's extraordinary talents and encourages her upward journey. They form an unspoken alliance. Her misguided older sister succumbs to the affections of a married white man, and follows a tragic path.Ugly progress steps into the area and attempts to stem the tide. Men like Thornton Hicks and Mars Braxton are users who exploit those around them and rape the land. But the old ways are not so easily trampled, and the consequences devastating.Banty, as a final gesture of repayment, helps Ade fulfill a lifelong dream. But this act nearly costs her everything she has worked so hard to achieve.
author: Lee Ashe
